title: A Year Later, Al Jazeera Journalists Still Imprisoned In Egypt
teaser: Lourdes Garcia-Navarro speaks with Marwa Omara, fianc√© of imprisoned Al Jazeera journalist Mohamed Fahmy, about dealing with his year in prison and the hopes for an appeal in 2015.
